verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> A reed <S%G2563><s%> like <S%G3364><s%> a rod <S%G4464><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to me. <S%G3427><s%> Someone <S%G32><s%> <S%G2476><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "Rise, <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> measure <S%G3354><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s temple, <S%G3485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the altar, <S%G2379><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who worship <S%G4352><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Leave <S%G1544><s%> out <S%G1854><s%> the court <S%G833><s%> which is outside <S%G2081><s%> of the temple, <S%G3485><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> measure <S%G3354><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> it has been given <S%G1325><s%> to the nations. <S%G1484><s%> <S%G2532><s%> They will tread the holy <S%G40><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> under foot <S%G3961><s%> for forty <S%G5062><s%> - two <S%G1417><s%> months. <S%G3376><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> power to <S%G1417><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they will prophesy <S%G4395><s%> one thousand <S%G5507><s%> two hundred <S%G1250><s%> sixty <S%G1835><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> in sackcloth. <S%G4526><s%>"

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> olive trees <S%G1636><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> lampstands, <S%G3087><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the Lord <S%G2316><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> desires <S%G2309><s%> to harm <S%G91><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> proceeds <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devours <S%G2719><s%> their <S%G846><s%> enemies. <S%G2190><s%> <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> desires <S%G2309><s%> to harm <S%G91><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be killed <S%G615><s%> in this way. <S%G3779><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%> to shut <S%G2808><s%> up the sky, <S%G3772><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> it may not <S%G3361><s%> <S%G99999><s%> rain <S%G1026><s%> during <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> prophecy. <S%G4394><s%> <S%G2532><s%> They have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the waters, <S%G5204><s%> to turn <S%G4762><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to strike <S%G3960><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> with every <S%G3956><s%> plague, <S%G4127><s%> as often <S%G3740><s%> as <S%G1437><s%> they desire. <S%G2309><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> they have finished <S%G5055><s%> their <S%G846><s%> testimony, <S%G3141><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> that comes <S%G305><s%> up out of <S%G1537><s%> the abyss <S%G12><s%> will make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> overcome <S%G3528><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> kill <S%G615><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> dead bodies <S%G4430><s%> will be in <S%G1909><s%> the street <S%G4113><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> spiritually <S%G4153><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> was crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> From among <S%G1537><s%> the peoples, <S%G2992><s%> <S%G2532><s%> tribes, <S%G5443><s%> <S%G2532><s%> languages, <S%G1100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> people will look <S%G991><s%> at their <S%G846><s%> dead bodies <S%G4430><s%> for three <S%G5140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a half <S%G2255><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> allow <S%G863><s%> their <S%G846><s%> dead bodies <S%G4430><s%> to be laid <S%G5087><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> a tomb. <S%G3418><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> who dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> rejoice <S%G5463><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they will be glad. <S%G2165><s%> <S%G2532><s%> They will give <S%G3992><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> to one another, <S%G240><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> tormented <S%G928><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> the three <S%G5140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a half <S%G2255><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> the breath <S%G4151><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> feet. <S%G4228><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who saw <S%G2334><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Come up <S%G305><s%> here! <S%G5602><s%>" <S%G2532><s%> They went up <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the cloud, <S%G3507><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> enemies <S%G2190><s%> saw <S%G2334><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G5610><s%> there <S%G1096><s%> was a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a tenth <S%G1182><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> fell. <S%G4098><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%> people <S%G444><s%> were killed <S%G615><s%> <S%G3686><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> terrified, <S%G1719><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> to the God <S%G2316><s%> of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
The second <S%G1208><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> is past. <S%G565><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> quickly. <S%G5035><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The seventh <S%G1442><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> sounded, <S%G4537><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> followed, <S%G1096><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> has become <S%G1096><s%> the Kingdom of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He will reign <S%G936><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever! <S%G165><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The twenty <S%G1501><s%> - <S%G2532><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> elders, <S%G4245><s%> who sit <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s throne, <S%G4098><s%> fell on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> faces <S%G4383><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshiped <S%G4352><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

saying: <S%G3004><s%> "We give <S%G2168><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> thanks, <S%G2168><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> the one who is <S%G5607><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who was; <S%G2258><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you have taken <S%G2983><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> reigned. <S%G936><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The nations <S%G1484><s%> were angry, <S%G3710><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> as <S%G2532><s%> did the time <S%G2540><s%> for the dead <S%G3498><s%> to be judged, <S%G2919><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> bondservants <S%G1401><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> their reward, <S%G3408><s%> as well as <S%G2532><s%> to the saints, <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who fear <S%G5399><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> to the small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the great; <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to destroy <S%G1311><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who destroy <S%G1311><s%> the earth. <S%G1093><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>'s temple <S%G3485><s%> that is in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> was opened, <S%G455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the ark <S%G2787><s%> of the Lord <S%G846><s%>'s covenant <S%G1242><s%> <S%G2532><s%> was seen <S%G3700><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> temple. <S%G3485><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Lightnings, <S%G796><s%> <S%G2532><s%> sounds, <S%G5456><s%> <S%G2532><s%> thunders, <S%G1027><s%> an earthquake, <S%G4578><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> hail <S%G5464><s%> followed. <S%G1096><s%>
